videoTitle: The EU's Health Insurance Card Explained! #shorts #CreditEU
transcription: human rights is an important pillar of the EU which means Healthcare is of the utmost importance when traveling or living abroad medical emergencies can unfortunately happen in the past this meant expensive hospital bills and high medical debts this is why the EU established a European health insurance card this Insurance Grants Citizens Medical access throughout the EU at no additional cost additionally doctors and nurses can practice medicine in other European countries currently over 200 million people possess a European health insurance card and 31 countries participate in the program to hear more about the EU and how it affects your daily life subscribe
